definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
to wade across the river, feeling for footholds as one goes (idiom)/to advance cautiously, step by step/to feel one's way forward
pinyin: mo1 zhe5 shi2 tou5 guo4 he2

definition: to crush one's own foot while trying to maneuver a rock (to a cliff edge, to drop on one's enemy) (idiom)/hoisted by one's own petard
pinyin: ban1 qi3 shi2 tou5 za2 zi4 ji3 de5 jiao3

definition: to move a stone and stub one's toe/to shoot oneself in the foot (idiom)
pinyin: ban1 shi2 tou5 za2 zi4 ji3 de5 jiao3

definition: lit. crossing the river by feeling for stones/improvise by trial-and-error/move cautiously
The Story of the Stone, another name for A Dream of Red Mansions 紅樓夢|红楼梦[Hong2 lou2 Meng4]
lit. an egg colliding with a rock (idiom)/fig. to attack sb stronger than oneself/to overrate one's abilities

sentences.english: The building is 3-storey high, which is made of stone.
sentences.chinese: 這座屋子高三層，是用外地的石頭製作的。

sentences.english: The cook baked a cake . The cake was baked too long. The cake is as hard as rock.
sentences.chinese: 廚子烤了一塊餅，烤餅的時間太長了，硬得像石頭。

sentences.english: Despite the clouds, the Matterhorn still was a great piece of rock to look at.
sentences.chinese: 除了雲朵外，馬特宏峯看上去始終是塊壯觀的石頭。

sentences.english: This is the Stone Town in Lijiang, Baoshan Township.
sentences.chinese: 這就是麗江的寶山石頭城。

sentences.english: He egged her on  to throw a stone through the window.
sentences.chinese: 他慫恿她扔一塊石頭打破窗戶。
他們無法想象向熊扔石頭的做法。

sentences.english: If his son asks for bread, will give him a stone?
sentences.chinese: 誰有兒子求餅，反給他石頭呢？

sentences.english: This special blade on his knife is for picking stones out of horses' feet.
sentences.chinese: 他刀上有一特製刀刃，是用來剔去馬蹄上的石頭的。

sentences.english: Semi-precious stones were used for inlay ornamentation.
sentences.chinese: 準寶石的石頭用來做鑲嵌裝飾。

sentences.english: Miao-nationality region's people like the stone.
Feeling the stones across the river, learning by doing while summing up.
sentences.chinese: “摸著石頭過河，邊幹邊學邊總結”。

sentences.english: The cook baked a cake. The cake was baked too long. The cake is as hard as rock.
sentences.chinese: 廚子烤了一塊餅，餅烤的時間太長，硬得像石頭。

sentences.english: North and south, directly go to photography floor to find m blue, just small stone.
sentences.chinese: 南北直接去攝影樓找米藍了，剛好碰到小石頭。

sentences.english: This method doesn't work well on resin statues and artificial landscape rocks.
sentences.chinese: 這種方法並不好於樹脂和人造景觀石頭雕像。

sentences.english: At last the goatherd threw a stone, and breaking its horn.
sentences.chinese: 最後這個牧羊人扔了塊石頭打破了羊的角。

sentences.english: Little red hat hurried to put a big stone into the wolf's belly.
sentences.chinese: 小紅帽趕快去找來大石頭填到狼的肚子裏去。

definition: one block/one piece/one (unit of money)/together/in the same place/in company
variant of 這裡|这里[zhe4 li3]
lump (of earth)/chunk/piece/classifier for pieces of cloth, cake, soap etc/(coll.) classifier for money and currency units
